user.description:
Please enter the same login details as in Super Soco's official app.

*Please note that Super Soco does not allow more than one client at a time, so any open session in the app will be closed each time entities are updated by this integration. You can adjust the update interval later on by clicking on Configure.*

data_description.email: Email for Open Street Maps API; only used if reverse geocoding is enabled (please read https://nominatim.org/release-docs/develop/api/Reverse/#other to know more)
data_description.enable_altitude_entity: Downloads additional data from Open Topo Data using the Mapzen dataset
data_description.enable_last_trip_entities: Downloads additional data from Super Soco; only available if native history is enabled; will be updated every 10 minutes at most
data_description.enable_last_warning_entity: Downloads additional data from Super Soco
data_description.enable_reverse_geocoding_entity: Downloads additional data from Open Street Maps
data_description.update_interval: Only when the vehicle is powered off; when it's on the interval will be 5 seconds
